introduction: This video provides guidance on which programming languages to learn based on the job you want. It covers game development, mobile development, artificial intelligence and machine learning, devOps, and AR/VR development. The video highlights the importance of choosing the right language from the beginning to reach your goals faster.

sections.title: Section 1: Game Development
content: Unreal Engine and Unity are the two popular game engines used in the industry.
C is the language of choice for Unreal Engine, while C# is used for Unity.
C also has its origin in C, which was developed by Microsoft as a competitor to Java.
The syntax of C is very similar to Java.

sections.title: Section 2: Mobile Development
content: There are two ways of developing mobile apps: native development and crossplatform development.
Cotlin is the language of choice for Android development, while Swift is used for iOS development.
Cotlin is fully interoperable with Java, making it easy to use existing Java code bases.
Swift is the language of choice for iOS development.

sections.title: Section 3: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
content: JavaScript with Node.js is a popular option for backend development.
Express is a popular JavaScript library for backend development.
Python with Django or Flask is another option for backend development.
Rust is a newer language that achieves safety and memory management through its own system.

sections.title: Section 4: DevOps
content: Python is a popular scripting language among devOps engineers.
Golang is another language that's gaining massive popularity in devOps.
Bash scripting is also essential for devOps.
Kubernetes is a popular container orchestration platform.

sections.title: Section 5: AR/VR Development
content: Swift UI is the language of choice for AR/VR development on Apple platforms.
The launch of Apple Vision Pro may change the landscape of AR/VR development.
Solidity is the most popular programming language among blockchain developers.
Ethereum is a popular blockchain platform for smart contracts.
